headline: Holding(s) in Shares
summary: TR-1: Standard form for notification of major holdings 1. Issuer Details ISIN GB00BVMTNR93 Issuer Name PAYPOINT PLC UK or Non-UK Issuer UK 2. Reason for Notification An acquisition or disposal of voting rights; An acquisition or disposal of financial instruments 3. Details of person subject to the notification obligation Name BlackRock, Inc. City of registered office (if applicable) Wilmington Country of registered office (if applicable) USA 4. Details of the shareholder Full name of shareholder
